DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to investigate whether RIPC protects the heart against ischemia reperfusion injury on the concentrically hypertrophied myocardium
DOC.brief_title: Remote Ischemic Preconditioning Induces Myocardial RISK Signaling Pathway in Patients Undergoing Valvular Heart Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients aged ≥20 years with severe degenerative AS presenting concentric remodeling of the LV, who were scheduled for AVR diabetes mellitus, coronary stenosis ≥70%, renal failure (serum creatinine > 2.0 mg/dL), upper arm peripheral vascular disease, LV ejection fraction <50%
